DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze natural course asymptomatic rotator cuff tear .
DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Study Asymptomatic Rotator Cuff Tears
DOC.detailed_description: Fifty subject asymptomatic rotator cuff tear identify earlier study . Clinical , sonographic MRI reexamination subject perform interval three year . Findings interest include : ( 1 ) symptomatic status subject ( still asymptomatic symptomatic ) ; ( 2 ) tear size sonography MRI ( unchanged increase ) ; ( 3 ) degree muscle atrophy MRI ( unchanged deteriorate ) ; ( 4 ) degree fatty muscle degeneration MRI ( unchanged deteriorate ) . We want analyze whether change tear characteristic associated change symptomatic status subject .
DOC.criteria: Subjects asymptomatic rotator cuff tear least one shoulder , tear demonstrate MRI sonography , ASES score exceed 90 point Earlier period shoulder pain dysfunction , earlier treatment shoulder problem
